name: saddlebag
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small bag that you fix to the back of your bicycle saddle, or one of a pair of bags that you put over the back of a horse or over the back wheel of a bicycle or motorcycle
hkuchera/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
